resources.string: <html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:gray;"> SHED Pharmaceuticals Limited is an Ayurvedic, Herbal and Nutraceuticals, Agro and Food manufactures Medicine Company dedicated for health care and a movement for the promotion of morality of Ayurvedic and Herbal medicine culture. Shed Pharmaceutical benefits from the accumulated knowledge of Ayurvedic and Herbal, blends it with the innovative latest scientific technology and converts it into efficacious Ayurvedic and Herbal medicine to cure the sufferings of mankind. </body> </html>
